channel.title: POST on I, Oliver Bonham-Carter, In June

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Here are some details to help you getting started with this theme.

item.title: Portfolio Definition
item.description: Here are some details about the portfolio settings.

item.title: Archetypes management
item.description: The archetypes are defined in the archetypes folder, for both post and portfolio.

item.title: Manage Your Menu
item.description: Menu in the sidebar can be defined within the config.toml or directly in the files. I prefer the config file approach, as this menu is pretty simple.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Introduction of the shortcodes defined in the personal-web theme.

item.title: Config File
item.description:
Here is the basic config file used for personal-web.

You can use it as a base for your website.

item.title: Open Graph image
item.description: Within any page, you can add in the FrontMatter a images array that will be used to define a specific Open Graph image. For example, see content/_index.md page: images: ["/images/sample.jpg"]
